<<<<<<< HEAD
Nonconformity not inconsistent with loyality, or, Protestant-dissenters no seditious or disloyal sectaries evidenc'd in a sober discourse upon those statutes, by which the Protestant-dissenters are prosecuted at this day : humbly offered to the candid consideration of all Protestants, whether conformists or nonconformists / by James Jones ... Jones, James, fl. 1683-1684.
[4], 20 p.
Printed for the author, and are to be sold by William Bateman ..., London : 1684.
Reproduction of original in Bristol Public Library, Bristol, England.
=======

Jones, James, fl. 1683-1684.
[4], 20 p.
Printed for the author, and are to be sold by William Bateman ..., London : 1684.
Reproduction of original in Bristol Public Library, Bristol, England.
